project_descr: Peacebuilding and Crisis Recovery Project for the Pacific Region

outputs.output_descr:
Output1: Development of a regional human security framework for consideration by regional governments.
Output 2: Establishment of regional civil society platforms on (a) conflict prevention and (b) gender, peace and security.
Output3: Provide advice and assistance on early recovery to up to 2 disaster affected countries requesting international assistance to respond to a major disaster.
Output4: Establishment of a regional community of practice on Community based disaster risk reduction and local level risk management in the Pacific region.

project_title: peacebuilding & security programme for the pacific
